mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY DATE(odate)) AS No, DATE(odate) AS date, SUM(oprice) AS sale, COUNT(*) AS count FROM ordering WHERE odate >= #{startday} AND odate <= #{endday} GROUP BY DATE(odate)

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(odate,'%Y-%m')) AS No, DATE_FORMAT(odate,'%Y-%m') AS month, SUM(oprice) AS sale, count(*) AS count FROM ordering WHERE odate >= #{startday} AND odate <= #{endday} GROUP BY month ORDER BY month
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY DATE(cinsertdate)) AS No, DATE(cinsertdate) AS date, count(*) AS count FROM customer WHERE cinsertdate >= #{startday} AND cinsertdate <= #{endday} GROUP BY date

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY cg.c_num) AS No, cg.c_num AS categotyId, cg.c_name AS categoryName, SUM(o.oqty) AS orders, SUM(o.oprice) AS sale FROM product AS p , ordering AS o, category AS cg WHERE p.pcategory = cg.c_num AND o.o_pid=p.pid AND o.odate >= #{startday} AND o.odate <= #{endday} GROUP BY cg.c_num

SELECT g.g_name, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY g.g_name) AS No, SUM(o.oqty) AS orders, sum(o.oprice) AS sale FROM customer AS c, ordering AS o, gender AS g WHERE o.o_cid = c.cid AND c.cgender = g.g_num AND o.odate >= #{startday} AND o.odate <= #{endday} GROUP BY g.g_name
SELECT p.pname, SUM(o.oqty) AS orders FROM ordering AS o, product AS p WHERE o.o_pid = p.pid AND o.odate >= #{startday} AND o.odate <= #{endday} GROUP BY p.pname ORDER BY orders desc LIMIT 5
SELECT SUM(o.oprice) AS sale, p.pname FROM ordering AS o, product AS p WHERE o.o_pid = p.pid AND o.odate >= #{startday} AND o.odate <= #{endday} GROUP BY p.pname ORDER BY sale desc LIMIT 5
